gamepad_button_count.htm+html.head.title: gamepad_button_count.htm+html.body.p:90-3
gamepad_button_count: This function will return the total number of buttons available for the gamepad connected to the given device "slot".

gamepad_button_count.htm+html.head.title: gamepad_button_count.htm+html.body.p:112-3
gamepad_button_count: The above code will return the number of buttons available on the gamepad plugged into device "slot" 0 and store the value in the variable "b_num".
